PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CargoCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of _IfcTransportElement_ and types of _IfcTransportElementType_ with the predefined type set to CARGO.

PropertyDef.Name: ProcessItem
PropertyDef.Definition: The type of item (and its measurement method) being modelled within a process. This can be cargo, passengers or vehicles that pass through the system.

PropertyDef.Name: AdditionalProcessing
PropertyDef.Definition: Any additional or special processing requirements on the associated cargo.

PropertyDef.Name: ProcessDirection
PropertyDef.Definition: The direction of flow of the cargo within the process.
